languages.text: {n}Голос Ульфара серьезен и спокоен, без обычной бравады.{/n} "Я — добрый воитель Всеотца, но вряд ли сердце мое можно назвать незапятнанным. Однако долг Волка — хранить Его отару, не ведая страха. Я готов взойти с тобой на борт сего святого судна и охранить от любой угрозы, что может ждать внутри. И в Семь Преисподних последствия".

{n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ульфара серьезен и спокоен, без обычной бравады.{/n} "Я — добрый воитель Всеотца, но вряд ли сердце мое можно назвать незапятнанным. Однако долг Волка — хранить Его отару, не ведая страха. Я готов взойти с тобой на борт сего святого судна и охранить от любой угрозы, что может ждать внутри. И в Семь Преисподних последствия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard His flock without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. And to the Seven Hells with the consequences."

{n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard His flock without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. And to the Seven Hells with the consequences."

{n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard His flock without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. And to the Seven Hells with the consequences."

{n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの声は冷静かつ真剣で、いつもの虚勢は弱い。{/n}「俺は全知の父の実直な戦士だが、心が汚れてないとは言いがたい。とはいえ、全知の父の群れを恐れず守るのが狼の聖務だ。俺はこの聖なる船にお前と乗り込み、内に潜んでいるやもしれぬあらゆる脅威から守る覚悟がある。何が起ころうと恐れはしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの声は冷静かつ真剣で、いつもの虚勢は弱い。{/n}「俺は全知の父の実直な戦士だが、心が汚れてないとは言いがたい。とはいえ、父の群れを恐れず守るのが狼の聖務だ。俺はこの聖なる船にお前と乗り込み、内に潜んでいるやもしれぬあらゆる脅威から守る覚悟がある。結果をもって七獄に向かおう」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的声音严肃而平静，不似往日那般张扬。{/n}“我是全父的杰出战士，但我的心灵不知是否仍然纯净。然而，无畏地捍卫全父的狼群是野狼的天职，我已经做好了准备，愿意与你们一同登上这艘神圣的飞船，为你们抵御可能潜伏在船上的一切威胁。无论发生什么后果，我都不在乎。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的声音严肃而平静，不像往日那般张扬。{/n}“我是全父的杰出战士，但我的心灵不知是否仍然纯净。然而，无畏地捍卫狼群是野狼的天职，我已经做好了准备，愿意与你们一同登上这艘神圣的飞船，为你们抵御可能潜伏在船上的一切威胁。无论发生什么后果，我都愿意面对。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar parle d'une voix sérieuse et calme, dénuée de sa bravade habituelle.{/n} « Je suis un respectable guerrier du Père de Tous, mais mon cœur ne peut pas être qualifié d’immaculé. Cependant, il est du devoir d'un Loup de protéger la meute du Père de Tous sans peur. Je suis prêt à monter à bord de ce vaisseau sacré à vos côtés pour vous protéger des menaces qui pourraient s'y cacher, et ce, quelles qu'en soient les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar parle d'une voix sérieuse et calme, dénuée de sa bravade habituelle.{/n} « Je suis un respectable guerrier du Père de Tous, mais mon cœur ne peut pas être qualifié d’immaculé. Cependant, il est du devoir d'un Loup de protéger Son troupeau sans peur. Je suis prêt à monter à bord de ce vaisseau sacré à vos côtés pour vous protéger des menaces qui pourraient s'y cacher et je me préoccuperai des conséquences une fois dans les sept enfers. »

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar es seria y tranquila y carece de su habitual jactancia.{/n} «Soy un guerrero al servicio del Padre de todas las cosas, aunque mi corazón dista mucho de ser impoluto. Sin embargo, a los Lobos nos corresponde vigilar la jauría del Padre de todas las cosas sin miedo. Estoy listo para subir a bordo de esa nave santa con usted y protegerla de cualquier amenaza que haya dentro, sin importar las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar es seria y tranquila y carece de su habitual jactancia.{/n} «Soy un guerrero al servicio del Padre de todas las cosas, aunque mi corazón dista mucho de ser impoluto. Sin embargo, a los Lobos nos corresponde vigilar su rebaño sin miedo. Estoy listo para subir a bordo de esa nave santa con usted y protegerla de cualquier amenaza que haya dentro, ¡y que las consecuencias se vayan a los Siete Infiernos!».

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme ist ernst und ruhig, ohne die übliche Prahlerei.{/n} "Ich bin ein aufrechter Krieger des Allvaters, doch mein Herz kann kaum als makellos bezeichnet werden. Ein Wolf aber hat die Pflicht, die Herde des Allvaters ohne Furcht zu beschützen. Ich bin bereit, mit Euch auf dieses heilige Schiff zu gehen und gegen jede Gefahr zu beschützen, die darin lauert. Die Konsequenzen scheren mich nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Stimme ist ernst und lässt seinen sonstigen Wagemut vermissen.{/n} "Ich bin ein aufrechter Krieger des Allvaters, aber mein Herz ist nicht ohne Makel. Allerdings ist es die Pflicht eines Wolfs, Seine Herde ohne Furcht zu bewachen. Ich bin bereit, an Bord dieses heiligen Schiffes zu gehen und Euch vor jeder Gefahr zu beschützen, die in seinem Inneren lauert. Und zu den Sieben Höllen mit den Konsequenzen."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, normal gösterişliliğini bir kenara bırakarak sakince, ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Ben, Yücebaba'nın gürbüz savaşçılarından biriyim ancak benim yüreğim dahi sütten çıkmış ak kaşık sayılmaz. Yine de bir Kurt'un görevi, korku nedir bilmeden Yücebaba'nın sürüsünü korumaktır. Bu kutsal araca seninle bir girmeye ve karanlıkta kol gezen tehlikelere karşı seni korumaya hazırım. Sonuçları umurumda değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is serious and calm, lacking its usual bravado.{/n} "I am an upstanding warrior of the Allfather, but my heart can hardly be called untainted. However, it is a Wolf's duty to guard the Allfather's pack without fear. I am ready to climb aboard this holy vessel with you and guard against any threat that may lurk within. I care not about the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, normal gösterişliliğini bir kenara bırakarak sakince, ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Ben, Yücebaba'nın gürbüz savaşçılarından biriyim ancak benim yüreğim dahi sütten çıkmış ak kaşık sayılmaz. Yine de bir Kurt'un görevi, korku nedir bilmeden Yücebaba'nın sürüsünü korumaktır. Bu kutsal araca seninle bir girmeye ve karanlıkta kol gezen tehlikelere karşı seni korumaya hazırım. Sonuçları umurumda değil."
